verses.verse: Listen, <S%H8085><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> to a father <S%H1><s%>'s instruction. <S%H4148><s%> Pay attention <S%H7181><s%> and know <S%H3045><s%> understanding; <S%H998><s%>
for I give <S%H5414><s%> you sound <S%H2896><s%> learning. <S%H3948><s%> Don't <S%H5800><s%> forsake my law. <S%H8451><s%>
For I was a son <S%H1121><s%> to my father, <S%H1><s%> tender <S%H7390><s%> and an only <S%H3173><s%> child in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of my mother. <S%H517><s%>

He taught <S%H3384><s%> me, <S%H559><s%> and said to me: <S%H3820><s%> "Let your heart retain <S%H8551><s%> my words. <S%H1697><s%> Keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and live. <S%H2421><s%>
Get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom. <S%H2451><s%> Get <S%H7069><s%> understanding. <S%H998><s%> Don't <S%H7911><s%> forget, neither swerve <S%H5186><s%> from the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Don't <S%H5800><s%> forsake her, <S%H8104><s%> and she will preserve you. <S%H157><s%> Love her, <S%H5341><s%> and she will keep you.
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is supreme. <S%H7225><s%> Get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom. <S%H2451><s%> Yes, <S%H7075><s%> though it costs all your possessions, get understanding. <S%H998><s%>
Esteem <S%H5549><s%> her, <S%H5549><s%> and she will exalt you. <S%H3513><s%> She will bring you to honor, when you embrace her. <S%H2263><s%>
She will give <S%H5414><s%> to your head <S%H7218><s%> a garland <S%H3880><s%> of grace. <S%H2580><s%> She will deliver <S%H4042><s%> a crown <S%H5850><s%> of splendor to you. <S%H8597><s%>"
Listen, <S%H8085><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> and receive <S%H3947><s%> my sayings. <S%H561><s%> The years <S%H8141><s%> of your life <S%H2416><s%> will be many. <S%H7235><s%>
I have taught <S%H3384><s%> you in the way <S%H1870><s%> of wisdom. <S%H2451><s%> I have led <S%H1869><s%> you in straight <S%H3476><s%> paths. <S%H4570><s%>
When you go, <S%H3212><s%> your steps <S%H6806><s%> will not be hampered. <S%H3334><s%> When you run, <S%H7323><s%> you will not stumble. <S%H3782><s%>
Take firm hold <S%H2388><s%> of instruction. <S%H4148><s%> Don't <S%H7503><s%> let her go. Keep <S%H5341><s%> her, <S%H2416><s%> for she is your life.
Don't <S%H935><s%> enter into the path <S%H734><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> Don't <S%H833><s%> walk in the way <S%H1870><s%> of evil men. <S%H7451><s%>
Avoid <S%H6544><s%> it, <S%H5674><s%> and don't pass by it. <S%H7847><s%> Turn from it, <S%H5674><s%> and pass on.
For they don't <S%H3462><s%> sleep, unless they do evil. <S%H7489><s%> Their sleep <S%H8142><s%> is taken away, <S%H1497><s%> unless they make someone fall. <S%H3782><s%>
For they eat <S%H3898><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of violence. <S%H2555><s%>

But the path <S%H734><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is like the dawning <S%H5051><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> that shines <S%H215><s%> more <S%H1980><s%> and more until the perfect <S%H3559><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
The way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is like darkness. <S%H653><s%> They don't <S%H3045><s%> know what they stumble over. <S%H3782><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> attend <S%H7181><s%> to my words. <S%H1697><s%> Turn <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to my sayings. <S%H561><s%>
Let them not depart <S%H3868><s%> from your eyes. <S%H5869><s%> Keep <S%H8104><s%> them in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of your heart. <S%H8432><s%>
For they are life <S%H2416><s%> to those who find <S%H4672><s%> them, <S%H4832><s%> and health to their whole body. <S%H1320><s%>
Keep <S%H5341><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> with all diligence, <S%H4929><s%> for out of it is the wellspring <S%H8444><s%> of life. <S%H2416><s%>
Put away <S%H5493><s%> from yourself a perverse <S%H6143><s%> mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Put corrupt <S%H3891><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> far from you. <S%H7368><s%>
Let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> straight ahead. <S%H5227><s%> Fix your gaze <S%H6079><s%> directly before you. <S%H3474><s%>
Make the path <S%H4570><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> level. <S%H1870><s%> Let all of your ways be established. <S%H3559><s%>
Don't <S%H5186><s%> turn to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left. <S%H8040><s%> Remove <S%H5493><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> from evil. <S%H7451><s%>
